name: Honey Gloss & Go Duo Value Set
about: What it is:A pair of full-size bestsellers: the clinically tested Honey Infused Hair Oil to boost shine, hydrate, and tame frizz, plus a viral lip oil for juicy hydration with a fresh watermelon scent..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Delivers glossy hydration and shine.Highlighted Ingredients:- Mirsalehi Honey: Is a natural humectant that intensely hydrates, restoring moisture balance for shinier, stronger-, healthier-looking hair and lips..What Else You Need to Know:Glow up with Gisou‚Äôs glossy duo, powered by Mirsalehi honey and bee-garden oils for intense hydration and high shine. The ultimate hair icon, Honey Infused Hair Oil, boosts shine and smooths frizz in seconds, while the Honey Infused Hydrating Lip Oil coats your lips with shimmery shine and fruity hydration. These bestsellers are infused with irresistible scents..Fragrance Description:The Honey Infused Hair Oil features delicate, sweet notes of Mirsalehi honey sourced from Gisou‚Äôs bee garden for a luxurious, one-of-a-kind, sensorial fragrance that evokes Gisou‚Äôs rich heritage, rooted in nature and centered around six generations of beekeeping. The Honey Infused Hydrating Lip Oil is infused with the sweet scent of fresh, crisp watermelon..Clinical Results:Honey Infused Hair Oil:.This Set Contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Honey Infused Hair Oil.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing¬†effectiveness.
ingredients: -Mirsalehi Honey: Is a natural humectant that intensely hydrates, restoring moisture balance for shinier, stronger-, healthier-looking hair and lips..-Eight Bee-Garden Oils: Are rich sources of antioxidants and omegas-3, -6, and -9 that lock in moisture and intensely nourish hair..-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates, smooths, and visibly plumps lips...Honey Infused Hair Oil:.Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Trisiloxane, Mirsalehi Honey, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Passiflora Incarnata Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Parfum (Fragrance), Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, CI 47000 (Yellow 11), Tocopherol, CI 26100 (Red 17), Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool...Honey Infused Hydrating Lip Oil in Watermelon Sugar:.Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate/Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Dilinoleic Acid/Propanediol Copolymer, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Honey (Mel, Miel), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Propolis Wax (Propolis Cera, Cire de Propolis), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Extract, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Vaccinium Myrtillus Seed Oil, Glucomannan, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Aroma (Flavor), Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Trihydroxystearin, Tin Oxide, Citral, Linalool, Limonene, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 Lake (CI 15850).. .The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Honey Infused Hair Oil:.-After styling, apply a few drops from mid-lengths to ends..-Add more as needed, depending on hair length and thickness..-For fine hair, use one to two drops..-For medium hair, use two to three drops..-For thick hair, use three or more drops...The Honey Infused Hydrating Lip Oil:.-Glide directly onto bare lips, or apply over your favorite lipstick for extra-dimensional hydration and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Gisou Gloss Hydration Heroes Gift Set is a luxurious treat for both hair and lips. The Honey Infused Hair Oil delivers instant shine and hydration while taming frizz for up to 72 hours. Its lightweight formula makes it perfect for daily use without weighing hair down, and the subtle honey scent is heavenly. The Watermelon Sugar Honey Infused Lip Oil is equally impressive, providing intense hydration and a glossy finish without any stickiness. The fresh watermelon scent adds a delightful touch. Together, these full-size products are an indulgent, high-performance duo, ideal for gifting or self-care. Highly recommend!

I just received this product and exchange for this pose and I love this set! The gloss is super hydrating and shimmery and creates a gorgeous flow. The hair oil works super well my hair and adds just enough hydration without being over oily.

This set is so perfect for the holiday's or any gift The hair oil leaves my hair looking shiny and healthy without feeling heavy, and it smells incredible. The lip gloss is just so amazing‚ÄîI keep wanting to reapply it because it‚Äôs so yummy!

This set is adorable and perfect for a little self-care! The hair oil is lightweight, smells amazing, and makes my hair look so healthy and shiny without feeling greasy. The lip gloss is super hydrating and my new favorite I will be taking with me everywhere.
